items.instruction: Login to Exchange365 admin and convert the user mailbox to shared mail box
Give delegation access of the mailbox and also set the forwarding email address of the account
Revoked the license on O365 Admin and reduce the license count on CSP portal
Block the sign in of the account in O365

description.content:
Disable the user account and change the password

Remove from all security groups

Move the profile to disabled accounts OU

Provide access of RDS profile data to the user requested on the ticket.

User decommissioning process completed
